title: Surveying Assistant
description:
We have an exciting opportunity for a Surveying Assistant to join EA Networks.  Reporting to the Overhead Manager, this position will provide line surveying support and assistance. This is a part time role with flexible hours of up to 20 hours a week.
\n\n
 
\n\n
The role involves:
\n\n
\n\t
Assisting with the surveying and marking/ staking the designated points for new electricity lines.
\n\t
Mark measured points as directed with paint or stake markers.
\n\t
Assist in the measuring the survey of points as required.
\n\t
Ensuring that all standards, guidelines, and policies are followed.
\n
\n\n
 
\n\n
You must:
\n\n
\n\t
Be willing to work outdoors in a variety of locations, and at heights.
\n\t
Be willing to work in most weather conditions including rain and snow
\n\t
Be reliable and manage your own time to meet deadlines.
\n\t
Be an effective communicator.
\n\t
Be able to follow instructions and work unsupervised within a small team.
\n
\n\n
 
\n\n
 
\n\n
Join Us
\n\n
To apply, please submit your CV and Covering Letter in confidence. Applications close Friday 7th April 2021.
\n\n
 
\n\n
Please note: 
\n\n
Applications for this position should have New Zealand residency or a valid New Zealand work visa.  We also require all employees to complete a pre-employment medical check including drugs and alcohol testing and to complete a criminal history check with the Ministry of Justice.
